summary: Completed comprehensive testing of GrantFlow UI polish changes - font size increases throughout all pages. All backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend verification confirms base font increased to 15px, sidebar nav at text-[15px], stat cards with text-base labels/text-3xl numbers, organization cards with text-[15px] names/text-sm details, projects list with text-[15px] titles/text-sm badges, project detail state machine with text-sm/rounded-lg, budget cards with text-2xl numbers/text-base labels, admin stats with text-xl/text-sm, and documents with text-[15px] file names/text-sm details. Professional typography implementation verified.
passed_tests: Backend: All 32 API tests passed (100% success rate - no regression from UI changes)
Backend: Authentication, RBAC, organizations, projects, documents, OCR, compliance, admin all working
Frontend: Base font size correctly set to 15px in index.css
Frontend: IBM Plex Sans font family properly loaded and applied
Frontend: Login/registration pages load with professional typography

Frontend: Dashboard stat cards implement text-base labels with text-3xl numbers
Frontend: Organization cards use text-[15px] names with text-sm details and badges
Frontend: Projects list uses text-[15px] titles with text-sm badges

Frontend: Admin page stat cards use text-xl numbers with text-sm labels
Frontend: Documents page uses text-[15px] file names with text-sm details
Frontend: All font size increases properly implemented across components
Frontend: Professional typography rendering verified visually
Frontend: No UI regressions from font size changes

success_percentage.backend: 100% (32/32 API tests passed - no impact from UI changes)
